item.title: Please helpppp
item.dc:creator: @Wintercanon Wintercanon
item.description:
@Wintercanon wrote:

[quote=“imsuperman05, post:6, topic:418145”]Could it be this…

for(int i = 0; i < 316; i++) { player.getActionSender().sendString("",275,i); }
you’re looping through 0 - 316 strings and adding empty strings…[/quote]Yeah he could be overloading the client by spamming it with packets.

Read full topic

item.title: Please helpppp
item.dc:creator: @imsuperman05 imsuperman05
item.description:
@imsuperman05 wrote:

Could it be this…

for(int i = 0; i < 316; i++) { player.getActionSender().sendString("",275,i); }
you’re looping through 0 - 316 strings and adding empty strings…

Read full topic

item.title: Please helpppp
item.dc:creator: @tyb97 tyb97
item.description:
@tyb97 wrote:

Edit you run.bat, and put “pause” at the end, so you can see any errors it gives, then post those.

item.title: Please helpppp
item.dc:creator: @modzilla modzilla
item.description:
@modzilla wrote:

Hey guys i have two small bugs, well at least i hope they are small. But when i go to attack a bronze, iron, steel dragon at any location my client closes.

Also I am adding achievements to my achievement tab and when i added this:

                        if (buttonId == 33) {//Commands
                                player.getActionSender().sendInterface(275, false);
                                for(int i = 0; i < 316; i++) {
                                        player.getActionSender().sendString("",275,i);
                                }
                                player.getActionSender().sendString("That's all?", 275, 2);
                                player.getActionSender().sendString("Obtain level 99 in any ", 275, 16);
                                player.getActionSender().sendString("two skills.", 275, 17);
                                player.getActionSender().sendString("", 275, 18);
                                player.getActionSender().sendString("Reward: 2,000,000 GP", 275, 19);
                        }
                                break;
                        if (buttonId == 34) {//Commands
                                player.getActionSender().sendInterface(275, false);
                                for(int i = 0; i < 316; i++) {
                                        player.getActionSender().sendString("",275,i);
                                }
                                player.getActionSender().sendString("Hmm I can Handle More", 275, 2);
                                player.getActionSender().sendString("Obtain level 99 in any ", 275, 16);
                                player.getActionSender().sendString("five skills.", 275, 17);
                                player.getActionSender().sendString("", 275, 18);
                                player.getActionSender().sendString("Reward: 5,000,000 GP + ", 275, 19);
                                player.getActionSender().sendString("      Full Granite Armor ", 275, 20);
                        }
                                break;                
                        if (buttonId == 35) {//Commands
                                player.getActionSender().sendInterface(275, false);
                                for(int i = 0; i < 316; i++) {
                                        player.getActionSender().sendString("",275,i);
                                }
                                player.getActionSender().sendString("This is what im talkin' about!", 275, 2);
                                player.getActionSender().sendString("Obtain level 99 in any ", 275, 16);
                                player.getActionSender().sendString("ten skills.", 275, 17);
                                player.getActionSender().sendString("", 275, 18);
                                player.getActionSender().sendString("Reward: 12,000,000 GP + ", 275, 19);
                                player.getActionSender().sendString("      Full Skeletal Armor ", 275, 20);
                        }
                                break;        
                        if (buttonId == 36) {//Commands
                                player.getActionSender().sendInterface(275, false);
                                for(int i = 0; i < 316; i++) {
                                        player.getActionSender().sendString("",275,i);
                                }
                                player.getActionSender().sendString("Whoa take it easy!", 275, 2);
                                player.getActionSender().sendString("Obtain level 99 in any ", 275, 16);
                                player.getActionSender().sendString("eighteen skills.", 275, 17);
                                player.getActionSender().sendString("", 275, 18);
                                player.getActionSender().sendString("Reward: 18,000,000 GP + ", 275, 19);
                                player.getActionSender().sendString("     Full Rune Armor (g) ", 275, 20);
                        }
                                break;        
                        if (buttonId == 37) {//Commands
                                player.getActionSender().sendInterface(275, false);
                                for(int i = 0; i < 316; i++) {
                                        player.getActionSender().sendString("",275,i);
                                }
                                player.getActionSender().sendString("Yea, Call me Boss", 275, 2);
                                player.getActionSender().sendString("Obtain level 99 in all ", 275, 16);
                                player.getActionSender().sendString("twenty-five skills.", 275, 17);
                                player.getActionSender().sendString("", 275, 18);
                                player.getActionSender().sendString("Reward: 25,000,000 GP + ", 275, 19);
                                player.getActionSender().sendString("       Full Dragon Armor w/ Chain ", 275, 20);
                        }
                                break;[/code]


To this code i get no errors and my client just shuts off. Is it beacuse its out of bounds or what? im stumped...



[code]case 259:
                                if (buttonId == 5) {
                                        player.setLastChatMessage(new ChatMessage(0, 70, "My KillCount is "+player.KC +", my DeathCount is "+player.deathCount+"."));
                                        player.getUpdateFlags().setChatTextUpdateRequired(true);
                                        }
                                if (buttonId == 18) {
        player.getActionSender().sendInterface(275, false);
                                for(int i = 0; i < 316; i++) {
                                        player.getActionSender().sendString("",275,i);
                                }
                                player.getActionSender().sendString("DarkScape Commands", 275, 2);
                                player.getActionSender().sendString("* Commands *", 275, 16);
                                player.getActionSender().sendString("::yell", 275, 17);
                                player.getActionSender().sendString("::changepass", 275, 18);
                                player.getActionSender().sendString("::players", 275, 19);

                                if (buttonId == 19) {//Rock Crabs
                                        if(player.AncientTeleport == 1) {
